OOC:He is about four feet tall in beast mode....
::Halucigen::
Halucigen focuses on transforming to bot mode and successfully
does...He reaches up and grab Cliffjumpers handhobbling onto his one
leg...He flaps his wind and takes to flying in the air above CLiffjumper..
"Thank you...I owe you my life and I fully intend to repay you should
you ever need it.."
He looks up to his new pet Prowl..
'His mind is strong and i don't know how long my control bot will keep
him under my control...'

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Jeremiah <rdahl@s...> wrote:
> Cliffjumper's one damaged eye was receiving his attempts to
hypnotise him,
> but it didnt receive the information in his brain properly, his
other eye
> was focused on the monster, "Okay then, your story does make sense"
he puts
> his gun away, and his hand out, to help up the damaged robot.
>
>
> OOC: Out of curiousity, how tall is Hallucigen? Cliffjumper is mini
just so
> you know.
